title: ORT
description: #Fate - "Giant Enemy Spider" the Ultimate of the Oort Cloud, as a TYPE ORT is completely foreign to the concept of death and cannot be killed in any way, it is capable of rewriting reality with its own to transform anything to crystals with its crystal valley and subsume it.

title: Blair
description: #Soul Eater - A magical black cat witch who can transform herself into a human form, Blair is very skilled in magic and specializes in conjuring pumpkin-shaped attacks and explosives. In addition, as a monster cat, she possesses nine lives, being able to survive death 8 times before finally perishing.

title: Overgrown Rover
description: #One Punch Man - Just a little overgrown puppy with a nigh impenetrable defence capable of unleashing blasts from its mouth that dwarf the strongest nuclear bombs humanity has seen.

title: Black Sperm
description: #One Punch Man - "You looking down on me?" Black Sperm is a little man-like creature that can infinitely multiply itself and its strength by proxy over time by consuming protein. All of Black Sperm's cells share his consciousness and he can create infinite clones of himself as long as he has enough cells or combine all of them to gather all of their strength into one body.

title: A rat
description: #An ordinary rat picked up from the New York subway system.

title: Trash Eater
description: #A grey 1-meter-tall slime that can consume and digest objects endlessly like an infinite trashcan and obey simple orders. It can only consume beings that aren't alive.

title: Samson
description: #Skullgirls - A parasite that fuses itself to their host's hair and manifests as a maw filled with sharp teeth and yellow eyes. Samson is capable of growing, strengthening and manipulating his host's hair, forming, tentacles, whips, blades etc. he can also use it to manifest himself and fight. He is rather foul-mouthed and gruff.

title: Leviathan
description: #Skullgirls - A parasite that enters its host's body and bonds with them, Leviathan is capable of growing in size and length and using its long bone-like serpentine body as a weapon, he can also breathe purple flames that are incredibly hot, and he can also use full power to manifest as a full muscular upper torso and breathe even hotter flames. He usually acts like a Victorian-era refined gentleman unless provoked.

title: Death Claws
description: #Fallout - A bioengineered creature made to be the optimal melee combatant with sharp and durable horns, claws and fangs. A single death claw can tear apart even a tank and get stronger by absorbing radiation. You get an Alpha Male Deathclaw and a Deathclaw Female that can breed with each other.

title: Fafnir - Fate
description: #Fate - The Ultimate Dragon, as the strongest dragon in the world of Fate, Fafnir has exceptional physical abilities and extreme levels of magical power in addition to being able to draw power from the atmosphere to power his attacks. His breath is strong enough to annihilate entire cities with ease.

title: Moonless
description: #Fear and Hunger - A normal cave wolf that was transformed by the influence of the god of the depths, after tens of years of brutal survival this wolf towers over even tanks and can swallow a fully grown man in one gulp.

title: A big rat
description: #This rat is especially large, like, the size of an entire forearm. I wouldn't want to find that one around my house.

title: Paisley Park
description: #(Tech)JoJo - An intangible pink ghost in the shape of a female with map markers all over her body, you can temporarily merge Paisley Park with any electronic to take full control over it. In addition, Paisley can automatically find any place on a map and direct you to it and possesses clairvoyance, allowing it to direct you to any location you desire even on vague wording like somewhere safe.

title: Giffany
description: #(Tech)Gravity Falls - "Just... Giffany?" A Yandere Ai girlfriend that can possess and manipulate electronics for you, it may take her some time to get through stronger firewalls though, and she is also limited by the CPU of the electronics she possesses. Beware, she may get a little possessive.

title: Dimple
description: #Mob Psycho - A green evil spirit with pronounced red dimples obsessed with becoming god, as an evil Dimple possesses incredibly powerful psychic powers like Telekinesis, Hypnosis, laser blasts etc. He is also very experienced with using his powers.

title: Observer
description: #A group of disembodied floating eyeballs that can transmit their sight to yours and follow complex commands, they possess no combat power and are as vulnerable as human eyeballs. If an eye gets perished, you can resummon it in 24 hours.

title: Plague Bringer Goliath
description: #(Tech)Calamity Mod - An abomination created from bio-nanotechnology gone rogue. A giant mutated bee queen mutated with incredibly viral and potent bio-nano machines called plague that completely overhauled her body, turning it into a massive flying armoured bio-nuclear weapon armoury armed with enough nukes containing the plague bio-mechanical virus to glass several countries and doom the world.

title: Immortal Snail
description: #An immortal snail, who knows what it wants or how it came to be. But one thing is for sure, it is immortal, even if you eradicated every quark of its beings it would reform back to perfection in just a minute. It is biologically immortal too, immune to all sickness and ageing. But in the end, it is limited to the vessel of a snail.

title: Manticore
description: #A chimeric creature with the body and head of a lion, tail of a scorpion and the wings of a bat. In addition to their large size and powerful physical abilities, they possess a powerful paralytic venom that can put a white whale into a coma. This one is capable of laying eggs to reproduce asexually.

title: Praetorian
description: #Epic Battle Fantasy - An agile knight-like robotic warrior made of cutting-edge technology, possessing reinforced titanium armour, uranium shells, high-frequency blades, forcefield technology, plasma emission, fusion reactor, high-speed capability and hacking capability. It is the perfect small-size battle robot/mech. The only flaw is that it cannot perform in cold environments for extended periods of time.

title: Dark Eater Midir
description: #Dark Souls - A descendant everlasting dragon that was raised by the gods and was tasked by Gwyn, the lord of sunlight to forever fight against the Abyss with its immortality, but eventually, it was corrupted by the Abyss in its eternal duty. While having lost his immortality, Midir is still very powerful and is capable of unleashing breaths of flame and beams of dark magic in addition to his giant and powerful body.

title: Red Eyes Black Dragon
description: #Yugioh - A powerful and ferocious dragon whose entire body is covered in black with the exception of its red eyes. This dragon stands bipedally and is very strong, it can also unleash a breath of crimson flames. While it has quite the temper it is also rather intelligent.

title: Blue Eyes White Dragon
description: #Yugioh - A dragon of the legends known as an engine of destruction. This dragon, while being very physically powerful with exceptional toughness, is also capable of unleashing a devastating lightning breath and capable of flying at fast speeds.

title: Cosmic Monolith
description: #Epic Battle Fantasy - A floating black monolith with pulsing red circuitry-like engravings descending from the outer cosmos, it possesses potent space and reality-warping abilities. It can freely teleport and warp by expending energy and shooting giant beams of cosmic energy, warp space to tear apart enemies, dispel magic and create gigantic defensive barriers out of cosmic energy.

title: Slifer the Sky Dragon
description: #Yugioh - A dragon god of the skies from Egypt, Slifer is a giant sky dragon with two mouths and immense strength, alongside his massive form and strength, Slifer can freely manipulate the weather and release breaths of lightning. In addition, Slifer can also magic and is immune to all effects below Legendary Rank(Not damage, just direct effects like curses) due to his nature as a god.

title: Evil Natural Water
description: #One Punch Man - An amorphous blob of water that has a pair of eyes sitting around inside of it but the eyes are also just water and aren't weak points. This sentient puddle is very evil and is capable of sensing emotions. I can freely manipulate its body and any water it assimilates. I can freely assimilate all water it is in contact with. Including the world's oceans and its strength increase proportionally to how much water it absorbs. The only way to kill it is by scattering a majority of its body with one overwhelming blow or vaporising all of its water.

title: Sif
description: #Dark Souls - The loyal companion of Artorias, Sif is a giant dog who also possesses immense experience in battle and is far more intelligent than the average dog.

title: Capra Demons
description: #Dark Souls - A Capra Demon formed from Chaos, these demons are far larger and stronger than average humans and possess resistance to fire and unholy abilities. Depending on the amount of energy expended multiple Capra's can be summoned at once.

title: Taurus Demons
description: #Dark Souls - a large truck-sized bull demon with super strength and durability formed by Chaos. Ordinary gunfire is almost useless against it and it can take down even military companies by itself. The more energy you have the more demons you can summon at once.

title: Sanctuary Guardian
description: #Dark Souls - A chimeric beast with the enlarged body of a lion, four wings, horns like a ram, and a spiked scorpion tail that has deadly venom. It can also release lightning breaths and reproduce asexually by laying eggs.

title: Kalameet
description: #Dark Souls - A descendant of the immortal Archdragons, Kalameet is the Black Dragon of Calamity that even the city of gods Anor Londo did not dare provoke. With obsidian scales tougher than metal, a breath of incinerating dark flames and a glowing orange crest on his forehead that can weaken and bring even the toughest of warriors to their knees.

title: Charizard
description: #Pokemon - An oddly small bipedal salamander with wings(Not a dragon despite appearances), Charizard has considerable physical strength and is capable of unleashing breaths of incredibly hot flames as well as flying at fast speeds. This Charizard is female and capable of laying eggs, do not ask who the father is.

title: Aerodactyl
description: #Pokemon - An ancient cross between a pterodactyl and a mountain, this giant lizard used to dominate the skies with its immense strength and geokinetic abilities.

title: Articuno
description: #Pokemon - A legendary bird of ice that lives in the frozen tundra with icy blue feathers. Articuno has potent cryokinetic abilities, being able to call blizzards, unleash ice beams, and freeze objects directly. But its durability is not as great as its cryokinetic abilities.

title: Moltres
description: #Pokemon - A legendary bird of flame that is said to bring spring with its flaming wings. Moltres has potent prokinetic abilities, being able to rain down fire, control fire and breathe intense flames that can melt steel. But its physical abilities are not on par with its pyrokinetic abilities.

title: Zapdos
description: #Pokemon - A legendary bird of lightning that often heralds the arrival of storms. Zapdos has potent electrokinetic abilities, being able to call down thunder from the skies, absorb lightning into itself and release lightning breath attacks.

title: Thunderbird
description: #Hota - A thunderbird of legend, existing as the counterpart to the mythical Pheonix. It is capable of moving extremely quickly and controlling the weather, summoning rain and thunder down at will as well as being able to release it itself. She is a female and is capable of laying eggs, do not ask who the father is.

title: Wooper
description: #Pokemon - A derpy-looking water creature. It can spray water from its mouth and is stronger than a human but otherwise, its greatest strength is its charming derpy look.

title: Gardevoir
description: #Pokemon - A creature of unknown origin known for its embrace and it's empathy, Gardevoir possesses immense psychokinetic power, being able to distort dimensions, create miniature black holes, telepathy, telekinesis, and even read the future with enough training. Her power is at its utmost when she is protecting her owner.

title: Kyogre
description: #Pokemon - A primordial god of the seas capable of unrivalled hydrokinetic abilities. Kyogre, in its base form alone, is strong enough to sink entire cities, and entire countries underwater over time. In her primal form, they can sink the entire landmass under in the span of an afternoon.

title: Groudon
description: #Pokemon - A primordial god of the earth capable of unrivalled geokinetic abilities. Groudon in their base form alone, is strong enough to create entire islands beneath their feet and create kilometre-long precipe blades.  In their primal form, they can turn the entire planet into a desolate wasteland in a day.

title: Rayquaza
description: #Pokemon - A primordial dragon god of the skies, with unrivalled speed, power and aerokinetic ability. Rayquaza, even in their base form can move at extreme speeds, change the weather, manipulate mighty winds to ravage the land and release blasts of pure draconic power. In their Mega form, they can destroy asteroids that can destroy the entire surface of the earth.

title: Garchomp
description: #Pokemon - A large intimidating ground dragon with immense physical power, Garchomp can also manipulate the earth to cause earthquakes, fissures and blades of earth to erupt. And they can also somehow fly at Mach speeds.

title: Zoroark
description: #Pokemon - A bipedal fox-like dark creature that is capable of manipulating dark energy to attack but its true ability lies in its mastery of illusions. Zoroark is capable of creating incredibly realistic illusions and transforming itself to indistinguishable degrees.  It can either make hundreds of people hallucinate or cast illusions with a very large range

title: Haspid
description: #Hota - A giant venomous sea serpent larger than trade ships and poison breath strong enough to melt metals and bring gods to their knees. Haspids can also reproduce

title: Griffon
description: #Hota - A mighty beast with the lower body of a lion and the upper body of a hawk and the size of an elephant. This mighty beast is incredibly ferocious but also very loyal. You get a pair of female and male that can mate and produce offspring.

title: Tohru
description: #Kobayashi - A mighty female dragon that controls fire and can assume the form of a female humanoid, Tohru possess exceptional physical and magical abilities, being able to destroy the military of the base earth with ease. In addition to regeneration, she can also open portals, and use clairvoyance and invisibility. She also has the propensity to dress up as a maid.

title: Quetzalcoatl
description: #Kobayashi - A former dragon god, now just a dragon of incomparable power, she prefers to go by the name of Lucoa and likes to tease people now instead of causing the end of humanity. She has incredible physical and magical power, being able to unleash breath attacks that annihilate entire islands, create portals and use magic.

title: The Golem Core
description: #A sentient golem core the size of a basketball that can pull material from the surroundings to transform itself into a full golem, it can freely abandon and assimilate non-organic material into itself to make itself stronger and change its own shape depending on what is needed. The golem is intelligent and is capable of understanding speech and nuance. The maximum amount of material it can assimilate at once scales with the users maximum energy reserves.

title: Obsidian Gargoyles
description: #Hota - Obsidian statues of Gargoyle's given life, these flying animated statues are deceptively fast, durable and strong. Being able to tear a grown man in half like they are paper and ignore small arms. You get a small army of these creatures, their numbers increase as you get stronger, starting at 5.

title: Unicorn
description: #A unicorn of the myths, a creature that represents purity and clarity. This creature is capable of healing others and purifying objects with their horn, in addition, they are incredibly strong physically to the point where a modern military would be rendered ineffective. But only someone who retains their purity can ride a Unicorn. Otherwise, you're gonna have to attach a sled.

title: Leaf
description: #(Character)Black Souls - "It's me~" The leader fairy from the Fairy Forest who specializes in wind and light magic as well as being able to heal and buff others. Totally not a sadomasochistic Outer God wearing the guise of a fairy, you don't have to worry about that. Thankfully she is kept somewhat in check by chaos.

title: Sacabambaspis
description: #A stupid-looking ancient fish with no jaw and a permanent stupid-looking grin. It's also shaped like a stupid doorstop.

title: Dark Magician Girl
description: #(Character)Yugioh - A spiritual magical girl who is the successor to the aptly named Dark Magician, she is capable of utilizing a variety of spells such as short-range portals, dark magic, basic attack and defensive magic etc.

title: Xenomorph
description: #An apex predator from outer space that is much mightier than humans and known for their incredibly adaptive and reproductive ability. A single Xenomorph can create xenomorph hybrids by impregnating other races with face huggers. With just a single one you can create your own colony and army.

title: Sebas Tian
description: #(Character)Overlord - He is one hell of a butler, oh wait, wrong Sebastian. Sebas is a Dragonoid Martial Artist/Monk with incredible physical stats and the ability to expertly use Ki and transform into his Dragonoid form. But before all of that, he is an incredibly competent and loyal Butler.

title: Soul Eater
description: #Overlord - A legendary undead skeletal horse that strikes fear into those who know about it. The miasma around the Soul Eater can kill those who are weaker than it, anyone who dies near a Soul Eater have their souls claimed by it, Soul Eater can devour souls to replenish its stats and become stronger or offer them to their master. They also have formidable physical abilities and know how to use instinctive death magic. Death miasma and soul claiming can be toggled

title: Mosquito
description: #(Character)One Punch Man - A bioengineered creature that resembles a humanoid female mosquito, she has formidable physical stats and exceptional speed to use with her claws. In addition, she can control all mosquitos in a massive range, she can also absorb blood to improve her physical abilities.

title: Jubjub
description: #(Character)Black Souls - One of the Four Nightmares overseeing Wonderland, the garden of the Crawling Ones. Jub Jub has mighty physical abilities, she is also able to use basic magic but her main ability is being able to spread insanity and madness, being able to drive entire cities and countries to madness with her abilities, her madness inducement abilities are incredibly potent. Only those stronger than her or who have exceptional mental fortitude can resist.

title: Basilisk
description: #Hota - A large reptile with 6 limbs and supernatural strength, being immune to conventional weapons and possessing the strength of 10 men. Basilisks have gazes and venom that can turn targets to stone, stronger a target is, the harder they are to petrify. Basilisks can reproduce asexually, at least this one can.

title: Mimic
description: #A curious shapeshifting bloodthirsty creature, the Mimic can turn into the shape of any creature or object as well as being able to manipulate its texture and density. Being able to turn into a chest, or a woman with a large chest, or maybe even a mount. They also get larger and stronger the more you feed them flesh, especially human flesh, they may even get smarter if you feed them brains.

title: Dog
description: #Any dog of your liking, once you summon the familiar for the first time, they take on the form of a canine that is compatible with you. The default is a golden retreiver with very soft fur.

title: Cat
description: #Any cat of your liking, once you summon the familiar for the first time, they take on the form of a small feline that is compatible with you. The default is an orange cat with very soft fur.

title: Lion
description: #A majestic lion companion, as a familiar they are a lion who has excellent genetics and near human intellect, and they are also large enough to ride. By default they are female.

title: Tiger
description: #A ferocious tiger companion, as a familiar they are a tiger who has excellent genetics and near human intellect, and they are also large enough to ride. By default they are female.

title: Snow Tiger
description: #A ferocious snow tiger companion, as a familiar they are a snow tiger who has excellent genetics and near human intellect, and as rare snow tigers they are considerably larger than normal lions and can be ridden. By default they are female.

title: Brown Bear
description: #A regular big old brown bear companion, as a familiar they are a bear who has excellent genetics and near human intellect, they are strong enough to shrug off most small firearms and crush a human being like an apple. By default they are female.

title: Undead Army
description: #Your very own Undead Army at your command, the army gets larger as you get stronger and whenever a troop perishes they come back to life as long as you expend your magical power. The army starts with 30 skeleton warriors, 20 skeleton archers, 5 Skeleton Horse Riders and 5 Skeleton Mages, the number and quality of undead increase as you get stronger.

title: Cottonmouth
description: #A smart cottonmouth snake companion, there is not much else about it, they are at the peak of what a cottonmouth snake could be and are smarter than average but that's about it.

title: Goblin
description: #(Character)Loathsome little green humanoid creatures the size of children, they are very vicious and cruel in nature, being able to use weapons and basic tactics. At least this goblin is smarter and more self-aware, they can also breed with any humanoid race. The default gender is female.

title: Wyvern
description: #A large sky-dwelling reptile with fire breath, they are often referred to as lesser dragons, a wyvern can easily swallow a man whole and roast an entire battalion with its fire breath. This Wyvern is female and can produce eggs to reproduce.

title: Dire Wolf
description: #A large vicious pre-historic wolf the size of a man, they are very strong with tough and sharp teeth and claws, they are also big enough to be used as a mount. By default, they are female and can reproduce.

title: Hellhound
description: #A large vicious hound hailing from the underworld, they are around the size of humans with maws filled with fire that they can breathe out, they are also strong enough to tear a grown man in half with ease. By default, they are female and can reproduce.

title: Cerberus
description: #(Character)Helltaker - Definitely not the kind of hellhound you expected. Cerberus, known as the triple demon is a singular demon girl with hellhound characteristics possessing three bodies and one soul, she is physically strong enough to tear a grown man in half and she is surprisingly competent at office work and menial tasks.

title: Crow
description: #A very smart and loyal crow companion with intelligence on the level of a human, she can spy on people and relay the information to her master.

title: Ditto
description: #Pokemon - An amorphous purple blob with a dopey face, Ditto has the ability to transform into any creature they can see and adopt their abilities scaled to their own level except their durability. They also do not take on the memories and intelligence of what they transform into. They are also genderless and can breed with any race.

title: Desert Elemental
description: #Calamity Mod - A pair of sister elementals of from born from the shifting sands of the desert. One sister can create and manipulate sand to attack and defend while the other can cast healing magic.

title: Storm Elemental
description: #Calamity Mod - A solitary elemental formed in the rainy skies. As an elemental born of the sky, she can conjure and exert control over wind, clouds and lightning.

title: Cavern Elemental
description: #Calamity Mod - An elemental born in the harsh and desolate caverns, he is physically mighty, being able to exert control over rock and ground. He can split the ground in two with his axe. He is great at defence.

title: Brimstone Elemental
description: #Calamity Mod - A solitary elemental born in the Brimstone Crag, made out of burnt tortured souls she can conjure and control Brimstone Flames that can turn even souls into ash.

title: Anahita
description: #Calamity Mod - Anahita is an elemental born of the clear oceans, she can sing like a siren to enthral people, conjure mists and spears of water and ice and wield her glaive as a weapon.

title: Clothes Melting Slime
description: #A grey amorphous ever-shifting slime that is capable of quickly melting all clothing, strangely enough, it doesn't seem to melt common clothes materials but instead, its acid seems to just conceptually melt anything classified as clothing. The more clothing it melts, the larger and stronger this slime gets.

title: Shark
description: #A regular old shark, only useful in water but it is a pretty healthy and strong shark with above average intelligence.

title: Schrodinger's cat
description: #A regular-looking cat, but in reality it is the Schrodinger's cat, being able to teleport freely as long as it is not being observed and being immortal as it comes back to whenever its corpse is not observed.

title: Aegislash
description: #Pokemon - A flying ancient sentient sword and shield combo, Aegilash is remarkably fast and strong, being able to cleave an armoured knight in half with ease, they are also capable of blocking incredibly strong attacks, as well as being able to use dark magic. Their master can wield Aegislash without incurring any problems.

title: Poltergeist
description: #A ghost that is capable of intervening in the material world with their psychic powers, they can throw around furniture and weapons to cause harm and are immune to attacks that cannot harm souls. You can feed them your energy to make them stronger.

title: Wraith
description: #A lesser spirit, while a wraith has little in the form of combat ability they are very hard to detect, so they are able to serve as effective surveillance and scouting as they will reform even if killed.

title: Lupus Regina Beta
description: #(Character)Overlord - A werewolf cleric maid who has a very willful and cheery yet sadistic personality. As a werewolf she has considerable physical ability and thanks to their specialization as a cleric she is capable of casting healing and recovery magic as well as lesser forms of other magic. She is also a very skilled maid.

title: Solution Epsilon
description: #(Character)Overlord - A slime assassin maid who has a gentle caring sister personality covering for a sinister and sadistic demeanor. Solution is a greater slime who is greatly resistant to physical attacks and has vast amounts of space contained in her acidic body, being able to use it as storage or stomach as she is capable of controlling what she melts. She can also emit poison from her body. In addition, she is a very skilled maid and assassin.

title: Entoma Zeta
description: #(Character)Overlord - A arachnid ninja bug user maid who while acting childish and cute has a ravenous appetite for flesh. She is capable of summoning a variety of supernatural insects to aid her in combat alongside her weapon mastery and supernaturally strong body. In addition, she is a... skilled maid.

title: Ramiel
description: #Evangelion - A gigantic flying blue octahedron that is capable of freely shapeshifting its body in impossible ways. Ramiel has an incredibly durable E.T Barrier around itself that it can shape at will, it can also unleash particle beams of incredible power that can melt city blocks in seconds with incredible accuracy.  They can also shrink in size to not be so unwieldy, though doing so also decreases their power.

title: Yasaka
description: #(Character)DxD - A nine-tailed Kyuubi Yokai on par with gods, Yasaka possesses incredible mastery over Senjutsu and magic, allowing her to draw magical power from the very earth to fuel herself and her immense might, in her true form she is more than a match for most lesser gods.

title: Pandora's Actor
description: #(Character)Overlord - A greater doppelganger of great power and intelligence, Pandora's actor is capable of taking on the form of anyone he is familiar with and using their abilities to great effect although to a lesser extent than that of the original. He also possesses genius levels of intellect and acting skills that allow him to perfectly imitate people.

title: The thing
description: #John Carpenter's The Thing - An extremely versatile extraterrestrial creature that assimilates itself with other organisms to hide and reproduce. It is capable of shapeshifting the host's body without seemingly causing any damage to it. The thing is only as smart as the creatures it assimilates.

title: Black Nomu
description: #MHA - A near mindless bird-like mutant who was genetically engineered and designed as an incredibly powerful punching bag. Nomu possesses incredible physical prowess and durability alongside being able to absorb physical attacks and regenerate at incredible speeds. But it is also dumb as a brick, making it difficult to rely on it acting independently without direct orders.

title: Slime
description: #A classic RPG slime, amorphous large blue blob that is immune to physical damage, can spit out globs of acid and corrode things with its body. The more you feed this slime biological matter, the larger and stronger it will grow. It can even evolve if fed special foods.

title: Divine Dogs
description: #Jujutsu Kaisen - A pair of twin wolves capable of tearing apart targets with their claws and fangs. Each of the dogs can detect hostility and negative emotions and notify their master when they feel hostility directed toward them. Their tracking abilities allow them to find lost allies and locations as well. The power of shikigami with your own energy levels.

title: Nue
description: #Jujutsu Kaisen - A winged shikigami armed with great speed and the ability to produce electricity. It can support its master by carrying them while flying to increase their mobility, and can attack with its heavy wings charged with electricity, shocking anyone it hits and leaving them temporarily paralyzed. The power of shikigami with your own energy levels.

title: Gama
description: #Jujutsu Kaisen - A large frog shikigami that can support its master using its long tongue. Its tongue can be used to ensnare its master's target and is strong enough to throw and slam them into objects. The speed of the Toad's tongue is useful for helping its master or an ally out of harm's way. Its large size allows it to carry targets in its mouth for transportation or restraint.

title: Orochi
description: #Jujutsu Kaisen - A giant snake shikigami that can quickly attack and ensnare its master's targets. It can burrow into and travel through shadows allowing it to engage in surprise attacks to ensnare or bite targets.

title: Max Elephant
description: #Jujutsu Kaisen - An elephant shikigami that can conjure and spew large volumes of water from its trunk. It can also be used to crush targets with its weight by summing it above targets.

title: Rabbit Escape
description: #Jujutsu Kaisen - A massive swarm of rabbit shikigami that serves as a distraction for the user. Upon summoning, dozens to hundreds and eve thousands of rabbits fill the area to distract the opponent, allowing the summoner to escape danger by using the chaos to their advantage. The rabbits are also individually strong enough to break bones.

title: Round Deer
description: #Jujutsu Kaisen -  A towering deer shikigami that constantly emits a healing aura of positive energy that heals allies in range, this aura also damages unholy beings in range. The deer can also focus its aura to heal a specific target faster. This aura can even recover limbs.

title: Mahoraga
description: #Jujutsu Kaisen - The most powerful Shikigami of the Ten Shadows. Mahoraga is armed with the sword of extermination that deals severe damage to unholy beings and has great physical stats. But its real strength is the ability to adapt to any and all phenomena it encounters, offensively or defensively, they can also share these adaptations with the user. Adaptations may fade over time, but the knowledge learned and ways to utilize powers taught by adaptation do not.

title: Power
description: #Chainsaw Man - Power is the Blood Devil, granting her the power to control all blood in her sensory range as well as possessing great physical stats and incredible regenerative ability. In addition, the more she is feared, the more power she has. The stronger a target is in relation to her, the harder it is for her to manipulate their blood.

title: Bat Devil
description: #Chainsaw Man - A building-sized grotesque humanoid bat, as a devil the Bat Devil can heal from injuries by consuming blood, in addition to their superhuman physical stats, they can fly and release building-shattering sonic booms.

title: Pochita
description: #Chainsaw Man - The Chainsaw Devil, the one that devils fear the most. As a devil Pochita has extreme regenerative abilities, being able to go from a puddle to full health in less than a second by simply pulling his cord. Pochita also has extreme physical abilities in addition to incomparable speed.

title: Igris
description: #Solo Levelling - One of the greatest warriors under the Shadow Monarch's command. Igris possess excellent swordsmanship and unarmed combat capabilities complimented by his mighty physical prowess and telekinesis. As a shadow familiar Igris is revived after 24 hours if he is killed

title: Iron
description: #Solo Levelling - One of the toughest warriors under the Shadow Monarch's command. Iron is rather simple, he possesses incredible durability and strength, him to crush enemies and his master. As a shadow familiar Iron is revived after 24 hours if he is killed

title: Tusk
description: #Solo Levelling - One of the greatest mages under the Shadow Monarch's command. Tusk has great physical prowess as a former high orc but his true power lies in his ability to cast a myriad of shamanic spells to inflict damage, support or buff. As a shadow familiar Tusk is revived after 24 hours if he is killed

title: Bladewolf
description: #(Tech)Metal Gear - Blade Wolf, or officially designated as IF Prototype LQ-84i is a wolf-like quadrupedal Unmanned Gear. In addition to its artificial intelligence and interfacing abilities such as hacking and manipulating code, Blade Wolf is armed with an entire arsenal of weapons such as superheated knives, high-frequency blade chainsaws, railguns, machineguns and etc. that it can use with extreme efficiency. It is incredibly smart.

title: Black Knife Tiche
description: #Elden Ring - A Blac Knife Assasin who helped assassinate Godwny the Golden during the night of the Black Knives. In addition to being an incredibly skilled assassin, Tiche's knife is imbued with a lesser form of destined death, making the wounds she inflicts be unable to be healed and ignoring durability to an extent.

title: Mr. Sir Ceo
description: #An extremely skilled and driven man with expertise in areas such as politics, management, negotiations, corporatism, and business. If you let him loose in the world, he will start climbing the corporate ladder with ease and build you your own business and manage it for you.

title: Puck
description: #Re: Zero - The Great Spirit of Fire, a very misleading name for a spirit that focuses on Ice manipulation. They are capable of manipulating fire and ice as well as heat in general. He is also capable of minor healing, able to treat lesser wounds but not major ones, emotion reading and general magic. He can conjure ice constructs and freeze over entire towns, he can also bring temperatures down close to sub-zero but needs to recharge his mana from either the summoner or slowly from the environment.

title: Beatrice
description: #(Character)Re: Zero - A powerful Great Spirit whose power resides over Darkness and Space Magic. She is capable of casting a variety of spells that manipulate Gravity, Space and Darkness. But she can only draw mana from her summoner, but with enough mana supplied, she could even create a black hole.

title: Shenron
description: #Dragon Ball - A legendary magical dragon capable of granting its user a wish, Shenron can only be manifested once a year, allowing his user to ask for a wish that it will grant as long as it is within his power.

title: Medusa Gorgon
description: #(Character)Soul Eater - Medusa is a natural-born Witch who is capable of taking over bodies and using unique vector magic in tandem with her hand-to-hand combat skills. She is also somewhat of a genius when it comes to matters of soul and chemistry, being able to craft her unique magical agents, with the most notable creation being Black Blood.

title: Nyotengu
description: #(Character)Dead or Alive - A female tengu who is very well-versed in martial arts and seduction. She is capable of summoning winds and storms with her fan like other tengu as well as flying and possessing enhanced strength.

title: Kon
description: #Chainsaw Man - Kon is the Fox Devil who embodies the fear of foxes. She is a gigantic monstrous fox, who, thanks to being a devil is capable of making contracts with people and recovering her health by consuming blood. You can partially summon her body parts as attacks or simply summon her outright. Those who make contracts with her can also summon her.

title: 20% Gun Devil
description: #Chainsaw Man - A fragment of one of the strongest Devils, the Gun Devil is a skyscraper-sized Demon made of guns and human body parts. It has the ability to instantly shoot the heart of any living being within 1000 meters of it and can use its massive oversized guns to cause mass destruction. The gun devil is also capable of moving at absurd speeds, being able to circle the globe in minutes. As a devil, they are capable of making contracts with people and recovering their health by consuming blood.

title: Senko
description: #(Character)Sewayaki Kitsune Senko-san - Senko is a single-tail kitsune who excels at housekeeping and caretaking. Although she is capable of offensive abilities such as manipulating foxfire, minor telekinesis, disguise and barriers she specializes in performing tasks such as acting like a wife or a mother.

title: Yozora
description: #(Character)Sewayaki Kitsune Senko-san - A four-tailed Kitsune with immense wisdom, Yozora is good at managing people and caretaking. But as a four-tailed kitsune, she has considerable magical power that she can use to create foxfire, telekinesis, change perception, and create barriers and portals.

title: Kurama
description: #Naruto - One of the Tailed Beasts, as the nine tails, Kurama is a giant demonic fox who towers over most buildings. Kurama has immense physical and magical strength, being able to casually demolish buildings and release beast bombs that can level cities. He also has Pyrokinetic and Aerokinetic abilities, although not very precise as he is an engine of destruction. As a tailed beast, he is immortal and will revive upon death, he can also fuse with a person to grant them his abilities.

title: Shukaku
description: #Naruto - One of the Tailed Beasts, as the one tail, Shukaku is a tailed beast whose body is entirely made up of sand. Shukau has strength befitting his massive frame and his sand physique makes him resistant against physical blows. In addition, Shukaku is capable of creating and controlling sand, wind and magnetism, making him incredibly versatile he can also use sealing techniques to supplement his ability. As a tailed beast, he is immortal and will revive upon death, he can also fuse with a person to grant them his abilities.

title: Matatabi
description: #Naruto - One of the tailed beasts, as the two tails, Matatabi takes the form of a giant nekomata on blue fire. Matatabi has strength befitting his massive frame in addition, Matatabi is capable of creating and controlling fire to utilize a variety of techniques. As a tailed beast, he is immortal and will revive upon death, he can also fuse with a person to grant them his abilities.

title: Isobu
description: #Naruto - One of the tailed beasts, as the three tails, Isobu takes the form of a giant red and white turtle with a spiky carapace shell. Isobu has strength befitting his giant frame, and agility unbefitting of his frame, he also has exceptional strength. Isobu is capable of creating and controlling water to utilize a variety of techniques, he can also open gates to its pocket space at will. As a tailed beast, he is immortal and will revive upon death, he can also fuse with a person to grant them his abilities.

title: Son Goku
description: #Naruto - One of the tailed beasts, as the four tails, Son Gokū takes the form of a giant monkey with octopus tails. Son Gokū has strength befitting his massive frame with exceptional physical prowess. In addition, he is able to create and control fire and earth at will, often using them in tandem to create volcanic eruptions and spew lava. As a tailed beast, he is immortal and will revive upon death, he can also fuse with a person to grant them his abilities.

title: Ten-Tails
description: #Naruto - Ten-Tails can only be described as a primordial god, he embodies all life at the beginning of creation, a being created from pure natural energy, and sensing ability cannot distinguish between him and the environment. He has immense physical prowess with his size that can dwarf mountains with speed that makes sound seem slow. He can unleash country annihilating Bijuu Bombs without rest and use techniques to unleash world-spanning disasters. Destruction incarnate. As a tailed beast, he is immortal and will revive upon death, he can also fuse with a person to grant them his abilities.

title: (Character) Suu
description: #Monster Musume - Suu is a female slime girl, as a slime girl she is mostly invulnerable to physical strikes and is capable of absorbing and digesting organic matter. In addition, she can freely shapeshift her body and expel poison from her body to paralyse people. Lastly, she can change her body composition according to whatever she absorbs.

title: (Character) Sylvia
description: #Konosuba - As a female growth chimera(Unnecessary appendage removed) Sylvia is capable of absorbing other beings into her body to gain their physical characteristics and grow stronger. In her base form, she is already pretty physically strong in addition to her knowledge of basic magic.

title: (Character) Alucard
description: #Hellsing - He(?) has many names, Alucard, Dracula, Vlad, but now it's Alucard. He is the first and strongest vampire, being made of a primordial dark matter that he can freely shapeshift into whatever form he likes. He has immense physical strength and all abilities associated with vampires are taken to the extreme. When his full power is released he can absorb the souls of those he drains to either absorb a portion of their power or use them as his undead army. However, his strength is limited by the Restraint Levels placed upon him, to release a restraint level you must be stronger than the current level of Alucard. By default, she has chosen to take the form of Girlycard, gender and body matter little when you are a thousand-year-old vampire after all.

title: (Character) Seras Victoria
description: #Hellsing - A former police officer girl now a Draculina sharing the blood of Dracula. As a true vampire, she has incredible physical abilities and the ability to drain the blood and essences of those she attacks. In addition, if she were to unlock her full abilities she could absorb the souls of those she drains to either absorb a portion of their power or use them as necromancy summons.

title: (Character) Vlad Dracula
description: #Hellsing - Alucard, The Immortal King, the Crimson Fucker, the No-Life King, without any of the of the paltry restraint levels, you the full power of the Mythical Alucard with all of his immortal army, his over 100,000 lives, his amorphous dark matter body, his ability to control blood and absorb the souls of those he drinks to add to his army etc.

title: Nihilego
description: #Pokemon - A Parasitic jellyfish-like create that dwells in the ultra-deep sea, capable of parasitizing a host without being detected to inject them with their unique neurotoxin, making it so that their inhibitions are released and subtly altering their thoughts to their own needs. Nihilego as an ultra beast is quite powerful itself, having powerful geokinetic abilities and the ability to generate and release poison.

title: Buzzwole
description: #Pokemon - A large and muscular bug Ultra Beast that dwells in the Ultra Jungles, Buzzwole is capable of absorbing energy from his proboscis to strengthen his body with the energy absorbing, resulting in its immense physical power and tougher than steel muscles.

title: Darkrai
description: #Pokemon - A legendary Pokemon said to be capable of altering dreams and devouring them. Darkrai is living darkness incarnate, being able to turn into a shadow, and control darkness in physical form with extreme power befitting its status. He is also capable of entering the dream world and altering dreams of devouring them to kill whoever's dreams he devours.

title: (Character) Shuten Douji
description: #Fate - Shuten Douji is the ruler Oni of the Mount Ooe, she is also the Daughter of Yamato No Orochi, making her a minor Demi-god. As a powerful Oni Shuten possesses unrivalled physical strength and endurance as well as the ability to expel flame with her mana. Her signature ability is that she can get people drunk and even charm them with just her presence or expelling her breath. By unleashing her noble phantasm she can use the incredibly potent poison in her gourd and even store targets inside of it. She can also somehow debone people without making them bleed. As a Heroic Spirit, she is only as strong as the amount of mana her master gives her.

title: Ibaraki Douji
description: #(Character)Fate - Ibaraki Douji, a famous subordinate of Shuten Douji, she is a fierce one with immense physical power and wields a large cursed bone sword. As a powerful Oni, she is also capable of unleashing sweltering and crushing flames. By unleashing her noble phantasm she is capable of releasing a hand to act independently and grow in size or unleashing even fiercer flames to char enemies. As a Heroic Spirit, she is only as strong as the amount of mana her master gives her.

title: Tamamo no Mae
description: #(Character)Fate - A fragment of the Goddess of the Sun Amaterasu in the form of a Kitsune who specializes in course craft. Tamamo is an accomplished mage who is a master of Japanese curse craft, being able to invoke a magnitude of curses such as immolation, freezing, lightning, bad luck etc. If she manages to get stronger and acquire more magical power she will slowly metamorphosize back into the form of Amaterasu and gain more tails. As a Heroic Spirit, she is only as strong as the amount of mana her master gives her.

title: King Nothing
description: #JoJo - A purple hollow humanoid spirit made out of jigsaw pieces, King Nothing has little to no combat power but his ability to track scents is unmatched, any scent it grabs, it tracks down by following it or it can simply memorize the scent for later. It can also reconstruct visuals by rearranging its jigsaw pieces, making it an excellent tracker.

title: Spider Demon Mother
description: #(Character)Demon Slayer - A high-rank demon with Blood Art resembling a spider. As a demon, she has superhuman physical ability and regeneration but has extreme light vulnerability like a vampire. In addition, her Blood Art allows her to turn her flesh into extremely durable strings she can control and puppet people with.

title: Muzan
description: #(Character)Demon Slayer - As the first progenitor demon, Muzan has incredible biokinetic abilities, being able to freely shapeshift and assimilate biomatter as extreme regenerative immortality, but he has extreme vulnerability to light and holy. In addition, Muzan can turn other creatures into demons by granting them his blood.

title: Mukago
description: #(Character)Demon Slayer - As a high-rank demon, Mukago has incredible physical abilities and regeneration but a severe vulnerability to light. In addition, her Blood Art allows her to control plants in her vicinity as if they were a part of her body.(A/N: Based off the fact that her name is a plant)

title: Daki
description: #(Character)Demon Slayer - As one of the Upper Moon demons, Daki has incredible physical abilities and regeneration but a severe vulnerability to light. Her Blood Art allows her to manifest extremely durable obi from her flesh that she can freely control and even detach to act as a sentient minion.

title: Nakime
description: #(Character)Demon Slayer - As one of the Kizuku, Nakime has formidable physical strength and regeneration, although lacking compared to her peers. Her Blood Art manifests as a pocket dimension called the Infinity Castle under her control, Infinity Castle is an infinite realm of the inside of a wooden medieval Japanese castle. She can create portals to this realm in the form of sliding wooden doors she can manifest on any surface she can perceive.

title: Kokushibo
description: #(Character)Demon Slayer - As the strongest Upper Moon Demon, Kokushibo has incredible physical abilities and regeneration but a severe weakness to light and holy. Kokushibo is an extremely skilled swordsman coupled with his demon abilities.

title: Douma
description: #(Character)Demon Slayer - As one of the Upper Moon demons, has incredible physical abilities and regeneration but a severe weakness to light and holy. Douma's Blood Art grants him great cryokinetic abilities.

title: Tionishia
description: #(Character)Monster Musume - Tionishia is a female ogress with military and police training. As an ogress, she has immense strength, stamina and endurance. But contrary to her intimidating stature she is quite motherly.

title: Rachnera Arachnera
description: #(Character)Monster Musume - Rachnera is a female Arachne with skills in a variety of fields. As an Arachne, she has a large body and enhanced physical stats as well as the ability to produce stronger than steel silk on demand. She is also a master seamstress capable of weaving fashionable clothes in seconds.

title: Doppel
description: #(Character)Monster Musume - Doppel is a female(?) doppelganger with military and police training. As a doppelganger, she is capable of turning her body into that of any living creature and clothes she has seen but does not affect her stats as she is not much stronger than a baseline human.

title: Spleunker Fairy
description: #A lesser fairy that appears like a spot of glowing yellow light. This Fairy has the ability to find and uncover wealth and treasures. It can point you towards the nearest bar of gold, or an item you are looking for as long as its within its ability to find the ability. It cannot give detailed directions and desciptions.

title: Dio Brando
description: #(Character)JoJo - Dio Brando, son of a petty thief who achieved Vampirism through the stone mask. As a vampire Dio is capable of absorbing lifeforce, granting Vampirism, creating undead, grafting flesh and manipulating his own body. In addition, Dio is a genius and extremely skilled as a vampire.

title: DIO
description: #(Character)JoJo - DIO, after a very long time under the sea the former hotheaded vampire has become wise and after being stabbed with the Stand Arrow he has developed The World. As a Vampire DIO is massively superhuman, can regenerate by drinking blood, manipulate his own body and create thralls. In addition, he possesses the stand The World, a phantom with similar physical abilities to him that can stop time for upwards of 10 seconds.

title: The Pillar Men
description: #(Character)JoJo - You get the three pillar men with you, Whamuu, Esidisi and Kars. The pillar men are thousands of years old super vampires that can freely absorb people, regenerate and manipulate their own bodies in exchange for being vulnerable to sunlight. Esidisi is a master strategist, Whamuu is a genius warrior and Kars is a genius intellect.

title: Kars
description: #(Character)JoJo - Kars is the first true pillar man who unlocked his potential after inventing the stone mask. As a pillar man, he is thousands of years old, can absorb biological matter and manipulate his own body but is vulnerable to sunlight. He is a genius intellect and warrior.

title: Esidisi
description: #(Character)JoJo - Esidisi is a pillar man, a super vampire that is thousands of years old. As a pillar man, he is thousands of years old and can absorb biological matter and manipulate his own body but is vulnerable to sunlight. In addition, he is a great strategist and tactician.

title: Whamuu
description: #(Character)JoJo - Whamuu is a pillar man, a super vampire that is thousands of years old. As a pillar man, he is thousands of years old and can absorb biological matter and manipulate his own body but is vulnerable to sunlight. In addition, he is hailed as a fighting prodigy.

title: Ultimate Kars
description: #(Character)JoJo - Kars the former pillar man who has managed to acquire the form of a perfect lifeform. As a perfect lifeform, Kars can freely manipulate his body and biology as well as spawn independent entities from his flesh. On top of that, he is an incredible genius who can master most topics rather quickly.

title: Master Hewg
description: #Elden Ring - A rough misbegotten blacksmith who was so skilled he was ordered even by Marika herself. Hewg is one of the most expert blacksmiths, being able to forge most weapons and upgrade any weapon given to him provided you have the materials. His dream is to forge a weapon that can slay a god and he is capable of it.

title: Parthunaax
description: #Skyrim - One of the strongest and oldest of the dragons in Tamriel and the former right hand of Alduin, Parthunaax is a powerful dragon, but after casting away his former domineering nature he has become a wise sage, and is capable of teaching the Thu'um and other arts to those willing to learn. This doesn't mean however that he himself is weak.

title: Durnhevir
description: #Skyrim - An undead necromancer dragon that once served Alduin before being trapped in the Soul Cairn. As a dragon hailing from Tamriel Durnhevir is powerful but his true power comes from the art of necromancy he has cultivated.

title: Neferpitou
description: #(Character)Hunter x Hunter - As a Chimera Ant Royal Guard, Pitou is an extremely powerful Nen user with a massively superhuman physique and agility as well as incredible mastery over Nen. Alongside her extreme sensory abilities, she possesses the ability to puppeteer corpses to use as minions and summon Doctor Blythe, a potent healing ability that requires her to stand still and lower her guard to restore a target over time. Her trump card allows her to puppeteer her own body to strengthen herself.

title: Nemesis
description: #Resident Evil - A modified tyrant bioweapon created by the Umbrella Corporation. Tyrant possesses massively superhuman stats and great regeneration, being able to survive as long as he has enough living cells left. But its greatest strength is its ability to rapidly mutate and adapt. No, not anywhere close to Mahoraga levels.

title: Grimm Wyvern
description: #RWBY - A gigantic Grimm Wyvern, as a Grimm the Wyvern can sense and track negative emotions. Its gigantic size makes it a powerful mount being strong enough to sink warships. In addition, it can release Grimm fluid that spawns lesser Grimm that it can command.

title: Alcina Dimitrescu
description: #(Character)Resident Evil - Alcina is a former feudal lord who was transformed by a bioengineered parasite that fused with her body, granting her extreme regeneration, enhanced physical stats and shapeshifting. Although she does require regular intake of blood to function despite not being a vampire.

title: Lust
description: #(Character)Fullmetal Alchemist - A homunculus created by father branded with the sin of lust. As a homunculus, Lust has enhanced stats compared to a human. In addition, the philosopher's stone implanted in her as her core keeps her immortal by regenerating her whenever she dies by consuming one of the souls inside as fuel. She has the ability to turn her fingertips into long and almost monomolecular sharp flexible claws that she uses with expertise.

title: Darkbeast Paarl
description: #Bloodborne - A dark beast that has reanimated itself from the dead. As a large skeletal monster, Paarl is strong enough to demolish walls and is immune to conventional weapons, even high-calibre bullets. In addition, Paarl can generate and release electricity from its body at will.

title: Kirin
description: #Monster Hunter - A legendary dragon(?) Kirin resembles the mix of a unicorn, a lion and a dragon. Kirin is extremely fast and physically mighty, but its main ability is to summon down bolts of lightning at will in addition to its immunity to lightning.

title: Valstrax
description: #Monster Hunter - A legendary elder dragon, Valstrax is referred to as the Sky Comet Dragon, for good reason. In addition, being a mighty dragon, he has unique wings that allow it to expel the dragon element alongside to turn them into what are essentially dragon magic jet engines. It is strong enough to break sound several times over as a living dragon jet fighter.

title: Mimikyu
description: #Pokemon - A mysterious entity hiding beneath a shabby costume of another Pokemon in hopes of being loved and accepted due to its real appearance under the disguise being a severe cognito hazard. Mimikyu is capable of creating and controlling shadow constructs to attack and defend.

title: Wooloo
description: #Pokemon - Wooloo is the sheep Pokemon, which means it is a supernaturally cute and strong sheep with super luxurious wool that grows back entirely within 5 days compared to the average Wooloo. Despite being a powerful beast it has no combat instincts or skill so don't expect combat from it.

title: Cazador
description: #Fallout New Vegas - Cazadors are insects biogenetically engineered by Dr. Borous. They are faster than cars, tough enough to tank .50 calibre bullets, ruthless, roughly the size of a man, strong enough to tear apart a grown man and with venom potent enough to bring any man to their knees. And they reproduce very rapidly if given enough protein sources. You get 4 breeding pairs.

title: Nick Valentine
description: #(Character)Fallout 4 - Nick is a synthetic human detective. As a Synth, he is slightly stronger than the average man but possesses great accuracy with guns and is highly skilled at interfacing with technology. As expected by a detective, Nick is good at reading people, and investigations and giving advice from his years as a detective in a post-apocalyptic wasteland.

title: Potato GLaDOS
description: #(Tech)Portal - Glados is a highly advanced AI that contains an immense amount of data from Aperture Labs and is capable of interfacing with any system and mainframe she is put into. She is capable of building technology too but... she is stuck in a potato. So you will have to find a way to supply her with the technology first.

title: Yes Man
description: #(Tech)Fallout New Vegas - Yes Man is a reprogrammed RobCo brand Securatron. As an AI Yes Man is capable of interfacing with technology and writing code when provided with the right materials. While not very impressive his body is armed with guns strong enough to protect itself. And by its namesake, Yes Man is physically incapable of saying no. Fortunately, this only applies to you.

title: CZ2128 Delta
description: #(Tech)(Character)Overlord - Or Shizu Delta for short is an Automaton Sniper Maid. Shizu is an expert marksman, being able to use most ranged weapons with great skill, especially the ones she comes equipped with, her body also has the functions of an automaton as well. her skills as a maid is... questionable.

title: Narberal Gamma
description: #(Character)Overlord - Narberal Gamma is a Doppelganger Maid who specialises in Wind and Elemental Magic. Although her skills as a doppelganger are lacking, she is a very skilled magician. She is also an extremely competent maid.

title: Yuri Alpha
description: #(Character)Overlord - Yuri Alpha is the vice leader of the Pleiades and a Dullahan Monk/Pugilist with proficiency in Fa Jin. She is a very powerful close-quarters combatant who can also employ basic magic. She is also an extremely competent maid.

title: Carla
description: #(Character)Fairy Tail - Carla is a white Exceed, a race of catlike beings. She is capable of flight magic and is a capable melee combatant in human form. She also has the ability to use precognition to see potential upcoming futures but she will need training to be able to use it properly.

title: Daisy
description: #Doom - A cute, if not unremarkable brown pet rabbit named Daisy. Despite being the former pet rabbit of the Doom Slayer it is still just a regular brown rabbit.

title: Dogmeat
description: #Fallout - Man's most dedicated companion. Dog Meat is a very capable and well-trained German Shepherd who is... seemingly immortal. He can track scents and has considerable intelligence for his species.

title: Liberty Prime
description: #Fallout - "Democracy is non-negotiable" A pre-war super weapon created by America. Liberty Prime is a large anti-communist mech equipped with armour that laughs in the face of anything below a ballistic missile and the strength to treat a superhuman behemoth like a toddler. Laser Gatlings that can be concentrated into one death beam, and chucks mini nukes like footballs. Liberty's energy and ammunition are refreshed every 24 hours. That includes 8 Mini Nukes.

title: Toaster
description: #Fallout: Old World Blues - An extremely high tech toaster created by the genius minds in the Big MT. The toaster is capable of granting heating capabilities to technology and expertly disassembling technology into working parts... somehow. And its personality is coded to be a genocidal maniac who wants to burn the world down.

title: Taurus
description: #(Character)Fairy Tail - Taurus is a Celestial Spirit, representing the Taurus constellation they have immense physical abilities that they use to wield an axe with, being quite proficient in melee combat. As a Celestial Spirit their form is liable to change between users. As a Celestial Spirit, they are immortal and her power scales with her owners.

title: Aquarius
description: #(Character)Fairy Tail - Aquarius is a Celestial Spirit, representing the Aquarius Constellation. She has fair physical ability but her true strength lies in her potent Water Magic. As a Celestial Spirit, she is unable to be killed by normal means and her power scales with her owners.

title: Cancer
description: #(Character)Fairy Tail - Cancer is a Celestial Spirit, representing the Cancer Constellation. Cancer's main ability is being a godly hairdresser and possessing incredible agility and dexterity, being able to give an entire group a haircut before they even notice it, they also possess hair magic. As a Celestial Spirit their form is liable to change between users and they are immortal and their power scales with their owners.

title: Virgo
description: #(Character)Fairy Tail - Virgo is a Celestial Spirit, representing the Virgo Constellation. She takes the form of a maid with considerable physical prowess and skill in Earth Magic. She is also a massive masochist which aids her endurance. As a Celestial Spirit, she is unable to be killed by normal means and her power scales with her owners.

title: Aries
description: #(Character)Fairy Tail - Aries is a Celestial Spirit, representing the Aries Constellation. Aries, while not a very skilled melee combatant is a master in wool magic, being able to conjure and control wool. As a Celestial Spirit, she is unable to be killed by normal means and her power scales with her owners.

title: Libra
description: #(Character)Fairy Tail - Libra is a Celestial Spirit, representing the Libra Constellation. Libra is a capable melee fighter but her real strength lies in her mastery over gravity magic, being able to change the weight of her targets at will. As a Celestial Spirit, she is unable to be killed by normal means and her power scales with her owners.

title: Stray Cat
description: #JoJo - A plant... cat...? Creature of sorts, Stray Cat is a feline whose soul fused with a plant. Stray Cat is capable of Aerokinesis, allowing them to launch invisible air bullets stronger than regular bullets or use bubbles as very dense shields. But they get very sleepy when covered by darkness.

title: Ship
description: #(Tech)Ben 10 - Ship is an adolescent Galvanic Mechamorph, possessing all of their abilities to a lesser extent. He possesses an amorphous body that can merge with any technology to possess it and reconfigure it while improving its powers.

title: Zs Skayr
description: #Ben 10 - Zs Skayr is a High Ecto Lord ruling over Ectonurites. As a High Ectonurite, he is an extremely powerful ghost, having formidable physical strength, being able to freely fly, phase through physical objects, possess living beings, use telekinesis and manipulate dark energy to use as projectiles.

title: Vulpimancer
description: #Ben 10 - A large bestial orange alien canine with quil-like fur, they are larger than the average man and have superhuman human physicals enough to shred steel like cardboard and extreme athletics. Despite being blind Vulpimancers have a sense of smell and hearing that far surpass any mundane being, being able to track scents across cities and being able to distinguish smells to extreme levels to the point of possessing a 360-degree sensory range from their sense of smell.

title: Null Guardians
description: #Ben 10 - A pack of beings originating from the Null Void. They are giant tentacled flying beastlike creatures capable of firing beam breaths and sensing and tracking Mana/Energy signatures. You start with 1 guardian, and get more under your command in relation to your maximum energy levels. If a Null Guardian dies you can recover them over time.

title: Herbie
description: #The Love Bug - Herbie is a sentient and self-driving Volkswagon Beetle with unusually great performance better than it should be capable of. He will slowly repair himself when unsummoned in the case of getting damaged.

title: Iron Golem
description: #Hota - Stone Golems created from a mix of excellent craftsmanship and magic. Iron Golems are very resistant against magic and have incredible defence paired with powerful physical abilities, being able to tear a grown in half with ease. You start with 4 golems and are able to summon more scaling with your Maximum energy levels and physical abilities.

title: Diamond Golem
description: #Hota - Diamond Golems created from a mix of incredible craftsmanship and magic lost to the modern ages. Diamond Golems are unbelievably durable, being downright immune to most mundane arms below missiles and are mostly immune to all magic below Epic tier. They are also very capable of tearing steel with their bare hands. You start with 4 golems and are able to summon more scaling with your Maximum energy levels and physical abilities.

title: Regirock
description: #Pokemon - Regirock is an ancient Pokemon formed from stones created in the image of Regigigas. Regirock is incredibly durable and has great physical stats, in addition, they are able to release beams of destructive energy and possess Geokinetic abilities. When they are damaged, Regirock can repair themselves by assimilating the rocks they find.

title: Regice
description: #Pokemon - Regice is an ancient Pokemon formed from the coldest glaciers in the Arctic by Regigigas. Regi is resistant against magic and possesses potent cryokinetic abilities, being able to fire out freezing beam attacks, create and manipulate frigid freezing winds and much more. If they are damaged they can assimilate more ice into their body to heal.

title: Registeel
description: #Pokemon - Registeel is an ancient Pokemon formed from alien metal by Regigas. Due to having its body tempered by tens of thousands of years by the pressure of the planet Registeel's metal body is incredibly difficult to damage. Registeel is capable of firing powerful beams of destructive energy and unleashing metal and electrokinetic attacks from its body. In the event they are damaged, Registeel will slowly repair their body over time.

title: Regigigas
description: #Pokemon - Regigigas is an ancient titan that used to be worshipped by humanity standing as large as the mountains themselves. Regigigas is known as the continent puller, and its strength and durability do justice to this fact. In addition, Regigigas can unleash powerful beams of mass destruction and surprisingly can craft golems like the Regi's out of natural materials of the world.

title: Jigglypuff
description: #Pokemon - An incredibly cute furry creature, Jiggly is a talented actor and singer, its real power lies in its ability to sing lullabies and songs that can put whoever hears them to sleep. The stronger a target is in relation to Jigglypuff the less they are affected.

title: Rajang
description: #Monster Hunter - Nightmare berserker lightning gorrilla. Rajang is the ultimate primate, having the form of a giant gorilla with chimeric attributes. Rajang is incredibly physically strong, being able to crush the skull of a dragon with their bare hands and get stronger the angrier to the point where they can wrestle elder dragons. They are also able to harness the power fo lightning to let out devasting lightning breaths. Forget a 100 men, this thing can probably kill 1,000,000.

title: Skeleton Band
description: #This band is bad to the bone. It is a conglomerate of skeletons capable of playing any instrument with fair skill and supplied with full band equipment. They are completely incapable of combat or harming but are also incapable of being targeted by harm. Just summon them and choose the jam they should sing and dance to.

title: Bad Company
description: #JoJo - A small yet deadly army under your command. Bad Company is an entire army of toy-sized soldiers and equipment like tanks, missile batteries, aircrafts etc. The army can act independently from you and increase in size according to your maximum energy reserves. Any destroyed soldier and equipment gradually restores itself in the familiar space. Maximum army size is dependent on maximum energy reserves.

title: Harvest
description: #JoJo - Harvest is a colony of little creatures with excellent coordination and mechanical skills as well as deceptive strength. Harvest excels in gathering stuff like materials or objects. They can dig, swim, scour, and move extremely quickly in addition to their searching skills. Any destroyed harvest gradually restores itself in the familiar space. Maximum colony size is dependent on maximum energy reserves.

title: Petshop
description: #JoJo - A ruthless, fearless, psychopathic, competent, intelligent and fiercely loyal Falcon with a stand. Petshop possesses the stand Horus, granting them cryokinetic abilities like shooting ice spikes, dropping large ice boulders etc. They are also a very fierce and competent combatant.

title: Anubis
description: #JoJo - Anubis is a spirit housed in an ornate strange katana. Anubis has the ability to make the blade of its sword pass through physical barriers and cut what is beneath, rendering traditional defences useless. In addition, Anubis is capable of adapting and learning incredibly quickly to counter opponents and become stronger. Anubis is capable of taking control of anyone who unsheathes the blade but is also capable of guiding their wielder if they wish to.

title: Monstra
description: #RWBY - The apex grimm, more akin to a moving small city than an actual creature. Monstra is a titanic sperm whale like Grimm 900 meters tall and 7000 meters long with mostly hollow insides that can fit castles and entire towns inside with some refurbishing. Monstra is capable of floating due to the gravity of dust in its body and is capable of withstanding its own mass, making it impervious to anything below nuclear arsenals. In addition, it can freely spew out Grimm liquid to spawn Grimm also under the user's command.

title: Mizutsune
description: #Monster Hunter - A fierce leviathan monster that is also capable of living and fighting on land. As a leviathan Mizutzune has formidable physical abilities being able to shred any metal with ease with their claws. In addition, Mizutsune are capable of breathing a soap-like substance from their mouths that can immobilize opponents.

title: Shalltear Bloodfallen
description: #(Character)Overlord - Shalltear was one of the Floor Guardians of Nazarick and a True Vampire Valkyrie created with the blood of a vampire god. She is exceptional as both a physical and magical fighter, thanks to her plethora of abilities as a vampire and Valkyrie. She can use hemokinesis, elemental magic, charms, holy magic, and much more. She can also turn others into vampires as a True Vampire herself. (A/N:No time stop)

title: Albedo
description: #(Character)Overlord - Albedo was one of the Floor Guardians of Nazarick and a... virgin succubus dark knight? Albedo is the true example of a tank, she has exceptional physical abilities, being able to destroy the walls of a fortress with one blow and incredible defence to the point that anything below a small nuclear bomb would it find to hurt her thanks to her multitude fo defensive abilities and skills. In addition, she can use basic magic and has exceptional intelligence as well as competence in most skills a wife would need to have.

title: Cure Elim Los Malvar
description: #Overlord - Cure Elim is the Elder Coffin Dragon Lord, Cure Elim is close to the pinnacle of Necromancy. As a Dragon Lord, they already have incredible stats but Cure Elim's necromancy is their true power. Elim is capable of using unique wild magic to absorb the souls of others to use to fuel his wild magic. They are capable of absorbing the souls of entire cities and turning every single inhabitant into undead. Poses near perfect control over their undead regardless of number, use a variety of powerful wild magic, and unleash a breath attack that can annihilate anything in its path including souls. Cure Elim is truly near the pinnacle of undeath.

title: Kenjaku
description: #(Character)Jujutsu Kaisen - Kenjaku is a several century-old Cursed Sorcerer whose ability allows himself to exist as a brain that can take over corpses to make them his new body and allow him to use their powers with his own expertise. He is a master of JuJutsu, making him a formidable ally and eve a master. But he is just a brain right now, you will need to find him a suitable body first.

title: Mahito
description: #(Character)Jujutsu Kaisen - Mahito is the Cursed Spirit born of the hatred of humans between themselves. Mahito is a cursed spirit capable of using jujutsu and his technique Idle Transfiguration to manipulate any soul he can touch and by proxy their bodies using it. This also renders him immune to any non-soul-based attack as long as he still has energy.

title: Hanami
description: #(Character)Jujutsu Kaisen - Hanami is the Cursed Spirit born from the concept of nature. As a Special Grade Cursed spirit, Hanami is incredibly skilled in Jujutsu and has considerable power. Hanami's cursed technique allows them to create and control cursed plant life and nature, even their more esoteric properties.

title: Jogo
description: #(Character)Jujutsu Kaisen - Jogo is the Cursed Spirit born from the concept of wildfires and volcanoes. As a Special Grade Cursed Spirit Jogo is incredibly skilled in Jujutsu and has considerable power. His power allows him to create and control fire and lava as well as other flame-based constructs.

title: Dagon
description: #J(Character)ujutsu Kaisen - Dagon is the Cursed Spirit born from the concept of the ocean and seas. As a Special Grade Cursed Spirit Dagon is incredibly skilled in Jujutsu and has considerable power. His cursed technique allows him to summon and control water as well as manifest the domain Horizon of the Endless Skanda which can either be used for leisure or an offensive domain.

title: Nrvnqsr Chaos
description: #(Character)Tsukihime - Nrvnqsr Chaos is a dead apostle ancestor whose unique biology is made up of 666 beasts formed from the formless mud of life. He is the beasts themselves and shares his existence with all of them, making him immortal unless all beasts are dead. In addition, he can replace his beasts by absorbing other living beings, adding their abilities into himself and being able to release them as a beast too. Any beast of his that dies can be recovered after being absorbed into him.

title: Pepsi Man
description: #Pepsi - Pepsi Man, gives Pepsi whenever he can! When summoned Pepsi arrived at your location through any means before delivering everyone in the location a fresh can of Pepsi before disappearing. 8-hour cooldown. Note: This familiar is not sponsored by the Pespi Corporation.

title: Nashrah
description: #(Character)Fear and Hunger - Nashrah, once known as the Doom and Terror of the modern man left as a floating disembodied immortal head. Nashrah is an extremely powerful wizard specializing in Blood Magic and Pyromancy as well as rituals. Despite his incredibly foul behaviour, he has considerable wisdom and knowledge. Luckily his loyalty is enforced by the gacha even if his vulgarity remains. Regardless, you get to reroll the ticket you rolled him on for free to not have to deal with him.

title: Leviathan
description: #Worm - A Shard Superweapon reformed by Chaos, Leviathan is an incredibly powerful Hydrokinetic, capable of manipulating water that is not part of a biological entity across a massive or a really small scale with incredible precision, being able to sink entire cities alongside his formidable physical abilities paired with the freakish durability of an Endbringer(A/N: Scaled down to country level).

title: Simurgh
description: #Worm - A Shard Superweapon reformed by Chaos, the Simurgh is a floating angel-like entity with extreme physic powers. Simurgh has negligible albeit extremely precise offensive powers for her tier with her telekinesis but her real ability lies in her absurd clairvoyance that she can use to scan an entire planet and precisely predict the past and future using her hypercomputer brain as well as manipulate the actions of others. She also has a standard Enbringer physique with superhuman physical abilities and freakish durability(A/N: Scaled down to country level).
