Her Tinker Database has been wiped clean but she can still scan and rebuild technology.

title: Behemoth
description: #Worm - A Shard Superweapon reformed by Chaos, and the toughest among the three siblings. Behemoth is a giant capable of manipulating energy, allowing it to shoot powerful lightning bolts, create flames and release shockwaves. He can also redirect projectiles, and manipulate and absorb existing energy to a limit. He can also unleash extreme amounts of radiation from his body. As an Enbringer and the physically strongest one he has incredible strength and durability(A/N: Scaled down to multi-country level)

title: Dragon
description: #(Character) - Not an actual dragon. Instead, Dragon, or Theresa is a hyper-advanced tinker-made AI who is capable of copying, imitating and iterating on existing existing technology to design her own. As an advanced, she is capable of directing hundreds of mechs with ease as long proper servers are supplied to her. But due to limitations on her code she is incapable of creating more AI.

title: Light and Nightfury
description: #How to Train Your Dragon - A breeding pair of a Nightfury and Lightfury, they are semi-aquatic agile lithe dragons who can release unique plasma breaths in contrast to the regular dragon fire breath. They are very fast and intelligent and possess great stealth abilities despite being dragons.

title: Blue Diamond
description: #(Character)Steven Universe - Blue Diamond is a former intergalactic with her own gem empire. As a Diamond gem, she has great physical abilities and durability with her gem, her core being insanely durable for her tier. She is capable of using energy-based attacks and unleashing emotion-manipulating aura. As well as possessing all of the abilities of the average gem such as shapeshifting, storage space, fusion, and restoring her physical form as long as her core is intact.

title: Lapis Lazuli
description: #(Character)Steven Universe - Lapis Lazuli is an unusually powerful Laips Lazuli. As a Lapis, a caste made for terraforming, she has powerful and precise hydrokinetic abilities being able to control vast amounts of water with enough precision to make water minions. As a Gem, she also has considerable physical abilities as well as the standard abilities they have such as shapeshifting, fusion and regeneration as long as her gem stays intact. Her maximum energy output and hydrokinetic ability scales with your maximum energy reserves.

title: Tiamat
description: #(Character)Fate - Tiamat is the Beast II of humanity, the Mother of All Life. As a Beast Tiamat has unmatched physical abilities and magical power. She is able to create and control the Sea of Life, a black mud-like conceptual substance that remakes any organism it consumes into one of her children, as long as the Sea of Life exists Tiamat lacks the concept of Death and has virtually unlimited magical power, and as long as Tiamat she can recreate the Sea of Life. She also possesses the ability to rewrite local reality with Nega-Genesis to deny all forms of anything that has evolved from base humanity like mythical abilities and gods.

title: Goetia
description: #(Character)Fate - Goetia is the King of Demons, a hivemind of 72 demon gods and a supreme magic system. He is capable of nullifying all magic with Solomon's 9 rings and is immortal as long any one of the 72 pillars is alive, and due to his temple of time, unless it is breached any of the pillars will revive there. He also possesses nigh omniscience with his Clairvoyance being able to see the past, present and future. He is an absolute master of magic and can rip out souls with a simple gaze.

title: Kirby
description: #Kirby - "Poyo!" One cannot begin to imagine or describe the powers this creature possesses.

title: Chicken
description: #Minecraft - Whatever this chicken is, it does not obey any known laws of physics. It lays an egg every 6 - 12 in perfect condition and this this egg can thrown at the ground to have a chance of spawning a baby chicken that will grow to adulthood in 24 hours, they can also breed without eggs too in order to produce children together. The eggs are not fertilized unless thrown and taste great, so does the chicken's meat. No biology explains this, you get a pair.

title: Golden Goose
description: #Yes, it really did lay some golden eggs. This otherwise regular-looking goose lays a golden egg every 24 hours, the egg is solid gold unless the Goose is fertilized.

title: Untitled Goose
description: #Unntitled Goose Game - The biggest asshole goose on planet Earth, and that is a hard title to contend with. This feathered menace is an expert at annoying and inconveniencing people. As if that were not enough, the Goose is immortal and will respawn in the familiar space 1 hour after its death.
